branchCategory.name: MXQR, Precision Slide Table (Recirculating Bearings) - Reversible Table
branchCategory.description: <p>The MXQR precision slide table features a removeable table that can be reattached to the actuator body in a symmetrically reversed position, thus changing the port directions. The precision slide table is integrated with hardened stainless steel guides and rails to isolate the load bearing from the movement of the dual rods and piston seals. The MXQR has mounting dimensions that are interchangeable with the legacy style MXQ. Dowel pin holes have been positioned for improved workpiece mounting repeatability.</p>
